subject: Marketing
title: Humor in Advertising
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Humor in Advertising.

hook.text: Old Spice went from grandpa's deodorant to a viral sensation with one absurd commercial.

buildup.text: Humor disarms skepticism. When you're laughing, your critical defenses drop.

discovery.text: Funny ads get shared 3x more than serious ones, extending reach for free.

twist.text: But if the joke overshadows the product, people remember the laughâ€”not the brand.

climax.text: The best humor ads tie the joke directly to the product's core benefit.

punchline.text: Make them laugh, then make them remember why.

quiz.question: What is the main risk of using humor in advertising?
options: People remember the joke but forget the brand
Humor always offends a portion of the audience
Funny ads cost significantly more to produce
